Detailed Description

Interface class for a particle-spring deformation system.

This class, based in vtkDeformationModel class, adapts the access to the external vtkParticleSpringSystem package.

Member Function Documentation

double *  vector 
) [virtual]

Add displacement at the specified point.

The displacement shall not be greater than a 1/10 of the input mesh radius

void vtkParticleSpringSystemInterface::Init ( ) [virtual]

Initialize the Deformation Model.

The model has to be initialized in order to be updated. Some parameters must be previously defined:

  • Input: vtkPolyData object
  • DistanceCoefficient: Maximum distance between points
  • DampingCoefficient: (d) oscillation coefficient
  • SpringCoefficient: (K) spring coefficient
  • Mass: unit mass of each particle
  • RigidityFactor: n-neighborhood connectivity
  • DeltaT: time step of deformation process
  • SolverType: motion equation solver type

Reimplemented from vtkDeformationModel.

bool vtkModel::IsDisabled ( ) [inline, inherited]

Check if model is disabled.

When an model is disabled it will NOT:

  • be visible.
  • be computed in collision detection.
  • be used in simulation.
bool vtkModel::IsHidden ( ) [inline, inherited]

Check if model is hidden.

When an model is disabled it will NOT:

  • be visible.
  • be computed in collision detection. It will be used in simulation.
bool vtkModel::IsVisible ( ) [inline, inherited]

Check if model is visible.

When an model is disabled it will:

  • be visible.
  • be computed in collision detection.
  • be used in simulation.
void vtkDeformationModel::RemoveBoundaryConditions ( ) [virtual, inherited]

Remove conditions of the deformation model.

All previously defined conditions are removed from the model. Condition collection object is not deleted.

void vtkModel::SetSource ( vtkPolyData *  source) [virtual, inherited]

Specify the source object for mesh synchronization purposes.

This is an optional input. If source is set, the model primary mesh will be synchronized to this source mesh whenever a change is made on it.

See also:
vtkPolyData* GetSource()

Member Data Documentation

vtkBoundaryConditionCollection* vtkDeformationModel::BoundaryConditions [protected, inherited]

Boundary conditions.

This acts as pointer to the deformation model collection of conditions

double vtkParticleSpringSystemInterface::DampingCoefficient [protected]

Damping coefficient.

Damping coefficient behaviour:

  • < 1 Under-damped. The system oscillates (with a slightly different frequency than the undamped case) with the amplitude gradually decreasing to zero
  • = 1 Critically Damped. The system returns to equilibrium as quickly as possible without oscillating
  • > 1 Over-Damped. The system returns (exponentially decays) to equilibrium without oscillating
double vtkParticleSpringSystemInterface::DeltaT [protected]

Calculation time step.

Deformation process time interval. The configuration is crucial, for greater values the system could become unstable.

double vtkParticleSpringSystemInterface::Mass [protected]

Mass of each particle.

Mass value for every particle of the system. All particles must be set to the same value. By default is set to 1.

vtkMotionEquationSolver::MotionEquationSolverType vtkParticleSpringSystemInterface::SolverType [protected]

Motion equation solver type.

There are several motion equation solvers available:

  • Euler
  • Modified Euler
  • Verlet
  • Runge-Kutta 4-5
double vtkParticleSpringSystemInterface::SpringCoefficient [protected]

Spring Coefficient.

Commonly known as K, defines the spring rigidity.
